description: [KOPILUWAK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1075) can use [netstat](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0104), [Arp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0099), and [Net](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0039) to discover current TCP connections.(Citation: Mandiant Suspected Turla Campaign February 2023)

external_references.description: Hawley, S. et al. (2023, February 2). Turla: A Galaxy of Opportunity. Retrieved May 15, 2023.
